title: Love Rewritten
overview: An assassination attempt triggers a soul-swap between divorcing couple Xiao Jingyang and Lin Mingxuan - sending them back to pre-wedding days! While cooperating to reverse the swap, their unresolved tensions flare. Just as their bodies return and truths emerge, Xiao pushes Lin awayâ€¦ only for her to uncover his secret. Now, with hidden forces stirring and death looming, Lin vows to stand by Xiao against all odds.
